lyrics:
29 contributorsi’m talkin’ to you lyricsproduced by just blaze

intro just blaze tip
no more hand claps still
ill take some hihats though
you aint gotta turn the lights down

just blaze
tip you ready
aight homeboi
here we go

grand hustle nigga

pc pimpin

but wont say the same thing when they get in they motherfuckin face yeah thats what the fuck i thought
tell them niggas im talkin to you nigga
do something about it

hook
im talkin to you
sucker nigga you can stunt all ya wanta stunt

fuck nigga you can hate all you wanna hate

youz a lame uz a shame to the game kid
i say it you know what ya name is im talkin to you
we can shoot it out whenever you wanna
whatever you wanna do fuckboy im talkin to you

ayy im the best you ever heard about fresher than you heard about

fore you know it your noggin split and your bottom teeth is fallin out

how many different ways is it to say im getting cheddar more
than a nigga twice as old way mo popular and even selling more
man i could send you to my pops maybe he could tell you better boy
patient in the afterlife ill waste you in the afterlife
even after my life haters be after my life
cause ima do in 06 what took em half of they life man im talkin to you
